nolijium.every_frame: I paid for the whole CPU
nolijium.options.enable_light_level_over: Show an overlay on blocks if the block light level above them is below 8 (§4red§r for light level 0, §eyellow§r for light level 1 - 7).
nolijium.options.max_chat_history.name: Maximum Chat History Size
nolijium.options.max_chat_history.toolti: Changes the number of messages kept in chat history (100 in vanilla).
nolijium.options.keep_chat_history.name: Keep Chat History
nolijium.options.keep_chat_history.toolt: If enabled, the chat history will not be cleared when you leave a server, and instead only be cleared when Minecraft is closed.
nolijium.options.keep_chat_bar_open.name: Keep Chat Bar Open
nolijium.options.keep_chat_bar_open.tool: If enabled, the server will be ignored if it instructs the client to close the chat bar (for example, if the player is teleported).
nolijium.options.remember_chat_bar_conte:
Controls what happens to the unsent contents of the chat bar if it is closed by clicking escape or by the server.
§lUNTIL SENT§r: Will always remember the unsent message/command unless the message was sent.
§lUNTIL USER CLOSED§r: Will only remember the unsent message/command if the chat bar was closed by the server.
§lNEVER§r: Will never remember the unsent message/command (same as vanilla).
nolijium.options.enable_tooltip_info.too: If enabled, useful information will be shown in the tooltips of links and clickable text in chat and other UIs.
nolijium.options.star_count.name: Star Count
nolijium.options.star_count.tooltip: Overrides the number of stars rendered.
nolijium.options.star_scale.name: Star Scale
nolijium.options.star_brightness.name: Star Brightness
nolijium.options.disable_fog.name: Disable Fog
nolijium.options.disable_fog.tooltip: If enabled, terrain fog will not be rendered.
nolijium.options.fog_override.name: Fog Override
nolijium.options.fog_override.tooltip: If set, this option explicitly overrides the fog distance.
nolijium.options.fog_multiplier.name: Fog Multiplier
nolijium.options.fog_multiplier.tooltip: If set, fog distance is multiplied by this option.
nolijium.options.fog_start_multiplier.to: If set, fog start distance is multiplied by this option.
nolijium.options.enable_pure_darkness.to: If enabled, light level 0 will render as pitch black.
Determines the minimum sky light level (20% in vanilla).
nolijium.options.hud_enabled.name: Enable HUD
nolijium.options.hud_enabled.tooltip: If enabled, a HUD will be drawn on the screen showing useful performance statistics.
nolijium.options.hud_alignment_x.name: HUD X Alignment
nolijium.options.hud_alignment_x.tooltip: The horizontal alignment of the HUD.
nolijium.options.hud_alignment_y.name: HUD Y Alignment
nolijium.options.hud_alignment_y.tooltip: The vertical alignment of the HUD.
nolijium.options.hud_margin_x.name: HUD X Margin
nolijium.options.hud_margin_x.tooltip: The HUD will be offset this many pixels horizontally from the screen edge.
nolijium.options.hud_margin_y.name: HUD Y Margin
nolijium.options.hud_margin_y.tooltip: The HUD will be offset this many pixels vertically from the screen edge.
nolijium.options.hud_background.name: HUD Background
nolijium.options.hud_background.tooltip: If enabled, a background will be drawn behind HUD text.
nolijium.options.hud_shadow.name: HUD Text Shadow
nolijium.options.hud_shadow.tooltip: If enabled, HUD text will be drawn with a shadow.
The HUD will refresh its contents this often. The §lI paid for the whole CPU§r option will refresh it every frame.
Lower values may reduce performance.
nolijium.options.hud_show_fps.name: HUD FPS Display
nolijium.options.hud_show_fps.tooltip:
Determines much information about FPS should be displayed in the HUD.
§lNONE§r: No FPS information will be displayed in the HUD.
§lSIMPLE§r: HUD will display a simple, accurate FPS value.
§lEXTENDED§r: HUD will display FPS, as well as a MIN (0.1% low), MAX (high), and AVG (average) FPS value.
nolijium.options.hud_frame_time_buffer_s:
The amount of frame time history to keep (in seconds).
Larger values will result in smoother average values, at the cost of higher memory usage if average FPS is very high.
Only applicable if HUD FPS Display is set to §lEXTENDED§r.
nolijium.options.hud_show_cpu.name: HUD CPU Usage Display
nolijium.options.hud_show_cpu.tooltip: If enabled, the HUD will show CPU usage.
nolijium.options.hud_show_memory.name: HUD Memory Usage Display
nolijium.options.hud_show_memory.tooltip: If enabled, the HUD will show Memory usage.
nolijium.options.hud_show_coordinates.to: If enabled, the HUD will show the player's coordinates.
nolijium.options.revert_potions.name: Revert Potions
nolijium.options.revert_potions.tooltip:
Restores potions effects to their original form.
Re-joining the server in multiplayer or closing and opening the world in singleplayer may be necessary to affect particles.
nolijium.options.disable_block_animation: Disables animations for water, lava, fire, etc.
nolijium.options.disable_sky.name: Disable Sky
nolijium.options.disable_all_toasts.name: Disable All Toasts
nolijium.options.disable_advancement_toa: Disables toast messages for receiving Advancements.
nolijium.options.disable_recipe_toasts.t: Disables toast messages for unlocking Recipes.
nolijium.options.disable_particles.name: Hide Particles
nolijium.options.chroma_speed.name: Chroma Speed
nolijium.options.chroma_speed.tooltip: Higher values cycle faster. Lower values cycle slower.
nolijium.options.chroma_block_shape_over:
If set, a chroma overlay will be drawn on block surfaces with the specified value used for transparency.
May look buggy on some blocks when §oFabulous!§r rendering is enabled.
nolijium.options.enable_chroma_hud.name: Enable Chroma HUD
